name: DRAVYOM - Cholesterol (Cosmetic Grade)
description: DRAVYOM specializes in cosmetic-grade cholesterol specifically optimized for barrier repair formulations. Their cholesterol grades are designed for optimal performance in cosmetic applications with full regulatory compliance. Focus on skin barrier repair and restoration of stratum corneum lipid balance.
notes: Specialized cholesterol grades for specific cosmetic applications. Focus on barrier repair and skin health. Optimal performance with full regulatory compliance. Cost-effective option for Asian and emerging markets.
